---
title: ReplacementUnderpricedError
icon: square-i
iconType: solid
---

> **注意**: 此页面尚未翻译成中文。以下内容为英文原版。

An attempt was made to replace a transaction, but with an insufficient additional fee to afford evicting the old
transaction from the memory pool.

## Extends

- [`quaisError`](/cn/sdk/content/interfaces/quaisError)\<`"REPLACEMENT_UNDERPRICED"`\>

| Property | Type | Description | Inherited from |

| `error?` | `Error` | Any related error. | [`quaisError`](/cn/sdk/content/interfaces/quaisError).`error` |
| `info?` | `Record`\<`string`, `any`\> | Additional info regarding the error that may be useful.<br /><br />This is generally helpful mostly for human-based debugging. | [`quaisError`](/cn/sdk/content/interfaces/quaisError).`info` |
| `shortMessage` | `string` | A short message describing the error, with minimal additional details. | [`quaisError`](/cn/sdk/content/interfaces/quaisError).`shortMessage` |
| `transaction` | [`TransactionRequest`](/cn/sdk/content/type-aliases/TransactionRequest) | The transaction. | - |
